title: Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 35 (Cults and
description:
Criticism of the Western Civilization - Collection 35 (Cults and New Religions 2):

We have 30 titles here:

-  Arweck - Researching New Religious Movements; Responses and Redefinitions (2006)

-  Atack - Let's Sell These People a Piece of Blue Sky; Hubbard, Dianetics and Scientology (2013)

-  Bender - The New Metaphysicals; Spirituality and the American Religious Imagination (2010)

-  Brower - Prophet's Prey; My Seven-Year Investigation into Warren Jeffs  and the Fundamentalist Church of Latter-Day Saints (2011)

-  DiPaolo (Ed.) - Godly Heretics; Essays on Alternative Christianity in Literature and Popular Culture (2013)

-  Dread - The Mystery of Christafarianism; or, Christafarianism 2.0; the Political Correct Update (2005)

-  Gallagher - The New Religious Movements Experience in America (2004)

-  Goodrick-Clarke - Black Sun; Aryan Cults, Esoteric Nazism and the Politics of Identity (2002)

-  Guinn - Manson; the Life and Times of Charles Manson (2013)

-  Hall - Apocalypse Observed; Religious Movements and Violence in North America, Europe and Japan (2000)

-  Headley - Blown for Good; Behind the Iron Curtain of Scientology (2009)

-  Hill - Beyond Belief; My Secret Life Inside Scientology and My Harrowing Escape (2013)

-  Horowitz - Occult America; White House Seances, Ouija Circles, Masons, and the Secret Mystic History of Our Nation (2010)

-  Klein - Scientology Exposed; the Truth about the Most Controversial Religion (2012)

-  Lippy & Williams - Encyclopedia of Religion in America (2010)

-  Many - My Billion Year Contract; Memoir of a Former Scientologist (2009)

-  Moynihan & Soderlind - Lords of Chaos; the Bloody Rise of the Satanic Metal Underground (2003)

-  Penczak - The Temple of High Witchcraft; Ceremonies, Spheres and the Witches' Qabalah (2013)

-  Persinger, Carrey & Suess - TM and Cult Mania (1980)

- Pike - New Age and Neopagan Religions in America (2004)

-  Pizza & Lewis (Eds.) - Handbook of Contemporary Paganism (2009)

-  Reiterman - Raven; the Untold Story of the Rev. Jim Jones and His People (1982)

-  Reitman - Inside Scientology; the Story of America's Most Secretive Religion (2011)

-  Scheeres - A Thousand Lives; the Untold Story of Hope, Deception, and Survival at Jonestown (2011)

-  Schmidt - Favorite Wife; Escape from Polygamy (2006)

-  Seldes - The Stammering Century (1928)

-  Unterman - The Kabbalistic Tradition (2008)

-  Wang - The Secret Temple (1980)

-  Webb - The Occult Establishment (1976)

-  Wilson - World Famous Cults & Fanatics; the Truth Behind the World's Most Secret Societies and Sects Revealed (1992)
